com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters

Class LiConversationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiBaseRecyclerAdapter
        • com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiConversationAdapter

  • public class LiConversationAdapter
extends LiBaseRecyclerAdapter
    RecyclerView.Adapter that can display a LiMessage and makes a call to the specified LiMessage. This class is responsible for displaying the message thread.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiBaseRecyclerAdapter

      • setupAcceptUI

        protected void setupAcceptUI(LiMessage item,
                             com.lithium.community.android.ui.components.adapters.LiViewHolderConversationMessage liViewHolder)
        This method sets up the UI for a message accept button. If a message is already accepted, don't show the accept button If a user doesn't have the right access to accept a post the button is hidden Also sets up the click on listeners on indivudual buttons.
        Parameters:
        item - @LiMessage
        liViewHolder - @LiViewHolder
